title: You may be the only one in your team with a positive score
body: But nobody is going to listen to you if you don't have a positive attitude.

replies.body: Making a sick play automatically makes you team leader.

I don't understand why you're getting downvoted. This is what I see in almost every ranked game. If someone was shotcalling, and NOBODY was listening, then they pull off a clutch play, immediately everyone starts doing what they say. It's hilarious.

Because most of these players mindset is "Don't tell me what we could be doing to increase our chances of winning the game, I want to play MY way." They rather lose the game than cooperate with their teammates in a TEAM GAME. {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
it's because people don't want to rely on others. they want to achieve things on their own. these are the guys who are more suited towards 1v1 games instead of league.
*"1v1 me scrub!*"
while it is fun to poke fun at them. alot of the times their skills in 1v1 situations is alot better than the team players. lol
I tell them "if you want 1v1, Dont sign onto a 5v5"

1v3 triple kill, people still don't listen 

{{item:3070}} {{champion:107}} {{item:3070}}
I bet they were danger pinging you while you were winning that fight, too {{item:3070}}

Whats that made up german word. It translates to "You're not wrong you're just an asshole"

It applies to so many matches where people don't realize that they could hav the winning strategy but if they hav the public speaking skills of a drunken sailor then they will not get anyone to want to care about listening

There are people who don't speak english who come to NA servers and make it to Diamond in a matter of weeks, obviously they have no way of inspiring their matchmade team, yet they climb no problem. Saying someone can't climb because they are a bad public speaker is blatantly false.

> [{quoted}](name=DDarius,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tfVhEWkW,comment-id=00010004,timestamp=2018-07-19T08:08:47.120+0000)
>
> There are people who don't speak english who come to NA servers and make it to Diamond in a matter of weeks, obviously they have no way of inspiring their matchmade team, yet they climb no problem. Saying someone can't climb because they are a bad public speaker is blatantly false.

Not about climbing, it's about shot calling. Its the difference between saying "I'm the only positive players so you idiots need to listen to me and go baron" and "I'll split bot, y'all go baron and I'll TP in if the enemy shows up"

Not saying a player has to rally their team to glorious victory every game but that if they're going to do attempt to coordinate the other players, then they could try not to be a dick while relaying strategy.

Just one problem - people won't listen anyway because why should they? And most of the time they won't even bother to respond with even a "K" or "Nah". Politeness doesn't open doors anymore, not online at least.

> [{quoted}](name=ExpStealer,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tfVhEWkW,comment-id=0001000400000000,timestamp=2018-07-19T20:01:33.036+0000)
>
> Just one problem - people won't listen anyway because why should they? And most of the time they won't even bother to respond with even a "K" or "Nah". Politeness doesn't open doors anymore, not online at least.

Completely false. It's just that because people hav a "being nice just makes me look weak" mentality their attempts to be nice come off at best as passive aggressive. 

I've had games when I've told my team how to play, I've been in games with that Yasuo player who thinks he's Faker. I didn't shit on him for messing up, I explained, as Nami that Yasuo you can ult off of my wave. That if he stayed with me he can get an ult off easier. Simple fix, he stopped roaming alone and we sieged mid. 

Long and short is that being nice helps. It's not the only solution and not everyone will be cooperative but it's far better than arrogantly barking orders at players
In the vast majority of my matches people refuse to listen. At all. It's as if we're playing different games.

> [{quoted}](name=ExpStealer,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tfVhEWkW,comment-id=000100040000000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-19T20:37:25.467+0000)
>
> In the vast majority of my matches people refuse to listen. At all. It's as if we're playing different games.

Not a different game, just two players with different mindsets

> [{quoted}](name=AnAggravatedPimp,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tfVhEWkW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-18T20:30:25.955+0000)
>
> Whats that made up german word. It translates to "You're not wrong you're just an asshole"

Waltersobchakeit, although it's a made up word based on a character from *The Big Lebowski*.
The word is [removed by moderation].  Or something.  Yeah I know what you're talking of.

> [{quoted}](name=IRight ArmI,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tfVhEWkW,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-07-18T20:39:42.903+0000)
>
> The word is [removed by moderation].  Or something.  Yeah I know what you're talking of.

Hey there. Edited your comment, since I know you didn't intend it offensively, but mentions of that individual at all -- especially in a joking fashion -- aren't board appropriate.
Can I say Joseph Stalin?

> [{quoted}](name=IRight ArmI,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tfVhEWkW,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-19T03:04:15.534+0000)
>
> Can I say Joseph Stalin?

Just avoid politics in general and dictators in specific.
hmmm... as german person i'd like to help you but im not sure if you mean what giantzorg alrdy mentioned.

> [{quoted}](name=Arammus,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tfVhEWkW,comment-id=00010003,timestamp=2018-07-18T20:54:43.165+0000)
>
> hmmm... as german person i'd like to help you but im not sure if you mean what giantzorg alrdy mentioned.

Djinn told me but thanks anyways!
Besserwisser, Klugscheisser?

Yeah people just don't want to win anymore. Personally I'd follow a guy who is flaming but knows what he's doing as I don't really play ranked to make friends. In a ranked game anyone who knows his stuff and tries to win is an ally, the rest are just enemies placed on the wrong team.
I have almost rank 3 honor level because of how rarely I type anything

> [{quoted}](name=Primaquarius,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tfVhEWkW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-18T20:26:40.183+0000)
>
> I have almost rank 3 honor level because of how rarely I type anything

Im honor 4 and I flame people sometimes
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tfVhEWkW,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-07-18T20:42:34.273+0000)
>
> Im honor 4 and I flame people sometimes
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

How do people drop in honor? There has to be a trick

sometimes you get the dice roll on whether or not riot picks you up. 

Been saying the same shit for years but one particular time got me a 10 game chat restriction even though I've said way worse (I think the literal only insults I said that game were "troll" and "trash" because I was being counterjungled by my own blitzcrank)

> [{quoted}](name=Tormentula,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tfVhEWkW,comment-id=0000000000000001,timestamp=2018-07-18T21:11:32.842+0000)
>
> sometimes you get the dice roll on whether or not riot picks you up. 
> 
> Been saying the same shit for years but one particular time got me a 10 game chat restriction even though I've said way worse (I think the literal only insults I said that game were "troll" and "trash" because I was being counterjungled by my own blitzcrank)

That's the thing though, you've been saying shit for years meaning you hav some kind of report history yet only hav one chat restriction. People get permabanned for chat related offenses and I'm just like "Did you type a novel in chat every match?"

> [{quoted}](name=AnAggravatedPimp,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=tfVhEWkW,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-18T20:45:25.946+0000)
>
> How do people drop in honor? There has to be a trick

I imagine by being mega toxic every game.
Can't carry morons.

"hey vayne can you buy GV ,cause their mundo is prety feed?"
"stfu you %%%% ,dont tell what to do you trash"
".....ohh ,soryy...."
What im trying to say ,its not that easy sometimes.
Flaming Vayne would result in the exact same response so just mute them and go on.
Having a good attitude rarely works anymore either.

You may be the only one on your team with a good attitude.

But you're just a detriment to the team if you're doing as bad as someone inting.

Maybe instead of looking at someone's attitude when they're giving relevant advice that you need, you pay attention to just the advice.

Go back to EUNE with these posts. Do you have evidence to support this claim? Since we're using anecdotal evidence, I played 10 game. Was playing awesomely in 8 and in 7 out of those 8 game, everyone listened to my calls. There you go.
I assume you weren't calling them trash and fahhots, just passive aggressive

Lool trash yes! And I'd get the "you're reported" every single time. Yet 3+ honors every game. The truth is, people want a leader if they can't be one. I'd rather have a president who knows what he's doing but throws insults rather than suffering with one who sucks at leading and is being nice.
So in those 7 games you were like "you trash twitch, go ward dragon" and they were all "yes master!" ? Hard to believe.

If they hold 2 wards and we don't have vision, you bet I do. Also, when they make stupid play after stupid play after stupid play, I call them trash. They flame back and I'm cool with it. But then they eventually follow my engage and calls on who to focus/shield etc.
Wow great advice, im sure no one ever thought of that !!

I don't need you to listen.

You will die regardless.

You're nothing more than a distraction so I can play safe

And I will use you as bait for my cage.

Sincerely,
{{champion:45}}
I agree 100%

You should also not expect the only strong person on your team being able to carry you when you and 2 others are not playing to be carried. Cause unless said player is playing some dumb 1v9 champ like master yi, you are not going to win when the weak players refuse to do any teamwork to enable that fed player.
Even if they were to listen they wouldn't do squat. That 0/14 botlane isn't going to suddenly start slaying because you made them feel good inside.
